overview: From 2025-12-15 to 2025-12-16, ethereum-optimism/design-docs had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 19 active contributors.

topContributors.summary: atenalt: Focused on activating hardforks across multiple mainnets, successfully merging two pull requests in `ethereum-optimism/superchain-registry` (#1183 and #1182) to activate Fjord, Granite, and Holocene hardforks. This work primarily involved other tasks, as evidenced by the modification of four files with a total of 10 lines added.

Inphi: Contributed to the `optimism` repository by merging a PR updating a client version and creating two issues, one of which was closed, while also providing three reviews. Their code changes involved modifying 26 files with a net addition of 678 lines, primarily focused on configuration.
janjakubnanista: Contributed to bugfix work today, merging a PR in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#18610) that added a `SafeRename` ioutil utility, reflecting a focus on code quality and utility.

pauldowman: Focused on enhancing the Superchain Registry by merging a PR to add a new version to standard-prestates.toml (ethereum-optimism/superchain-registry#1184), while also proactively identifying and documenting potential issues within Optimism related to interop action tests and client library usage (ethereum-optimism/optimism#18613, ethereum-optimism/optimism#18614).
